prompt: Create a drawing/painting app in a single HTML file. Build a canvas-based application where users can draw freely with various tools and colors. Make it as feature-rich and usable as you can - consider adding different brush types, colors, sizes, undo/redo, layers, save/load, effects, or any other features you'd expect in a creative drawing tool. Focus on smooth drawing experience and good UX.
system_prompt: You are an expert at creating interactive web applications with Canvas. Build the best drawing app you can.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement canvas drawing with brush controls and colors. Evaluated on drawing smoothness, features, and UX.

prompt: Create an interactive quiz application in a single HTML file. Build a quiz with multiple questions (you create them) that tracks progress and shows results. Make it as engaging and polished as you can - consider adding different question types, timing, scoring systems, progress tracking, answer explanations, difficulty levels, categories, or visual feedback. Create an enjoyable quiz-taking experience.
system_prompt: You are an expert at creating educational web applications. Build the best quiz app you can.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement quiz flow with questions, answers, and scoring. Evaluated on UX, features, and polish.

prompt: Create an expense tracker web app in a single HTML file. Build a full-featured personal finance tracker where users can add, view, and analyze their expenses. Make it as comprehensive and useful as you can - consider adding categories, date filtering, charts/visualizations, budgets, recurring expenses, export functionality, or any features that would help someone manage their finances. Include data persistence.
system_prompt: You are an expert at creating full-stack web applications. Build the best expense tracker you can.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement expense CRUD operations and data persistence. Evaluated on features, data visualization, and usefulness.

prompt: Create a live Markdown editor in a single HTML file. Build an editor with split-pane view showing Markdown source and rendered preview in real-time. Make it as feature-rich as you can - consider adding toolbar shortcuts, syntax highlighting, auto-save, export options, themes, keyboard shortcuts, different preview styles, or any features you'd want in a professional Markdown editor. Support common Markdown syntax.
system_prompt: You are an expert at creating text editing applications. Build the best Markdown editor you can.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement Markdown parsing with live preview. Evaluated on syntax support, editing features, and UX.
